title: Utility Design Engineer
jobDescription:
VISHVA ASSOCIATES is looking for Utility Design Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Research and draft blueprints, engineering plans, and graphics.
  2. Develop test prototypes.
  3. Identify solutions to improve production efficiency.
  4. Use design software to develop models and drawings of new products.
  5. Maintain existing engineering records and designs.
  6. Assess all engineering prototypes to determine issues or risks.
  7. Estimate cost limits and budgets for new designs.
  8. Supervise the manufacturing process of all designs.
  9. Coordinate with other engineers, management, and the creative department.

title: Sales Executive
jobDescription:
• Business development, Marketing and generation of leads in the selected sector and regions.
  • Focus on development of leads for evaporater and dryer in chemical ,Pharm and other sectors.
  • Adherence to the enquiry and prospect development system for effective evaluation &segregation of prospects in various categories.
  • Development & betterment of standard formats for the proposal & costings for various package and systems.
  • Market development through planned and systematic approach in the defined sector.
  • Regular feedback to the management regarding market needs & competitive offering.
  • Monthly report with action plan and clarity on what needs to be done for sustainable growth and meeting the target.
  • Represent company at various industry events.

title: Mechanical Draftsman
jobDescription:
Assist Purchase Department to prepare summarized project wise BOQ requirement

Assist marketing department to prepare equipment sketches required for bidding

Preparation of pipe duct drawing with required plate development

title: Engineer-Process
jobDescription:
• Generating PIDs, PFDs , fabrication drawings.
  • Finalizing plant layout & elevation drawings.
  • Detailing of fabrication drawing of distillation column, heat exchangers, tanks &vessels.
  • Review of isometrics & BOM from P & ID.
  • Calculation of line sizes ,vapor duct sizes ,vapor separator size, no of tube, thickness calculation of shell, tubesheet.
  • Costing of overall project.
  • Mass & energy balance calculation.
  • Preparing data sheet of control valve, pump, steam trap pressure safety valve, manual valves & PHE.
  • Calculation of cooling tower capacity, flam arrester, equipment sizing of heat exchanger, evaporation, distillation column, tank.
  • Standards like API, ASME & TEMA.
  • Site activities ,material and manpower supply by taking daily progress reports from site.

title: Software Engineering
jobDescription:
• Startup CA is looking for a strong mobile app developer who welcomes both engineering and maintenance tasks.
  • The primary focus will be to implement new user interfaces and features together with automated unit and integration tests.
  • You will be working with our candid and collaborative team, where your knowledge and advice about application architecture and the newest mobile technologies will be highly appreciated. The code you write will need to be cleanly organized and of the highest quality.
  • Youll also help ensure solid application performance and an excellent user experience. Outstanding experience in developing IOS and Android apps and publishing them.
  • Key Deliverables Develop new user- facing features and UI components Build reusable code and libraries for future use Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability. Able to analyze, design build scalable front- end web/mobile applications

title: Key Account Manager
jobDescription:
Take over key accounts from business development team.
Coordinate with customer, business development and operation team to ensure best service
and support with goal of achieving customer delight.
Define KPI’s for customer and track them to enhance repeat sales.
Ensures subscription revenue target and client retention.
Increase repeat orders from an account.

Upsell and Crosssell to the existing customers.
Dealing with Contractors, Builders, Corporates and Institutions.
Assist in the execution of the Go-To-Market plans and the sales operations.
Building and maintaining the relationship with partners key decision makers.
Passionate about creating value for customers.

Candidate Skill Set
Go-getter with passion for technical sales
A team player with excellent analytical, problem solving skills
Experience in B2B selling of electrical and IoT based automation solutions/products.
Should have strong effective communication and negotiation skills.
Self-motivated and able to independently manage the clients.

Qualification
MBA or Bachelor degree in electrical or software related discipline or equivalent
experience.
Experience of 1-3 years in B2B as KAM in IoT/SaaS domain.
